wmndsBrandedBannerProps.name: title
wmndsBrandedBannerProps.description: Required. HTML content to use as the title in the banner.

wmndsBrandedBannerProps.name: contentCol1
wmndsBrandedBannerProps.description: Required. HTML content to use in the first column of the banner.

wmndsBrandedBannerProps.name: contentCol2
wmndsBrandedBannerProps.description: HTML content to use in the second column of the banner. If left blank, this column will not display.

wmndsBrandedBannerProps.name: breadcrumbItems
wmndsBrandedBannerProps.description: Array of breadcrumb items to show in the banner. See the items property under Breadcrumb.

wmndsBrandedBannerProps.name: ctaButton
wmndsBrandedBannerProps.description: Call to action link (displayed as a button) to use in the banner. If not supplied, no button will be displayed.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the button.

arrayOptions.name: linkTitle
arrayOptions.description: Text to use as the link title.

arrayOptions.name: linkTarget
arrayOptions.description: Target attribute for the link. Defaults to "_self"
